text: Isaiah Randolph "Ikey" Owens (December 1, 1975 - October 14, 2014) was an American keyboardist. He was known for his work with The Mars Volta, Jack White and a variety of bands from the Long Beach music scene. On October 14, 2014, Owens was found dead in his hotel room in Cholula, Mexico, aged 38. He died of an apparent heart attack. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American keyboardists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Musicians from Long Beach, California
title: Isaiah Owens
